name: URLSessionDelegate
desc: A protocol that defines methods that URL session instances call on their delegates to handle session-level events, like session life cycle changes.

items.name: func urlSession(URLSession, didBecomeInvalidWithError: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the URL session that the session has been invalidated.

items.name: func urlSessionDidFinishEvents(forBackgroundURLSession: URLSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that all messages enqueued for a session have been delivered.

items.name: func urlSession(URLSession, didReceive: URLAuthenticationChallenge, completionHandler: (URLSession.AuthChallengeDisposition, URLCredential?) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests credentials from the delegate in response to a session-level authentication request from the remote server.

items.name: enum URLSession.AuthChallengeDisposition
items.desc: Constants passed by session or task delegates to the provided continuation block in response to an authentication challenge.
